name: Sparks 'n' Splash
description:
After a character to which Sparks 'n' Splash is attached uses a Skill: Deals 2 Pyro DMG to their team's active character.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character to which Sparks 'n' Splash is attached uses a Skill:</color> Deals 2 $[K103] to their team's active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
